page.title: 12SHOPPING FACILITIES.
page.content: {Wrenbury shops.}Two sell general groceries, toiletries, household goods,general items and pet foods.{ Both shops have part time employees. {SHOP 1 _}7day trading.Delivery to customers.Hours 8.00am _ 6.30pm. {SHOP 2 _}Hardware,clothing and petrol. Off licence and Post Office.Saturday half day closing,Sunday closed all day.Hours 8.00am _ 6.00pm. {Marbury Post Office _}also sells a limited range _ sweets,crisps, cigarettes and fire lighters.Owner managed.Hours 9.00am _ 5.30 pm.Half day _ Thursday,closed Sunday. {Mobile shop _}a family concern.Sells a wide range of domestic goods.Tours the whole area on Wednesday and Saturday. A sample survey revealed the need to shop farther afield in Whitchurch, Nantwich and Crewe.Chester and Shrewsbury are used occasionally.
